entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 105,112Chapters: 37/52Kudos: 281

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! And He has a task to fulfill, a mission to accomplish: prevent the Love-Square from forming. Be the home-wrecker and steal Marinette from Adrien. Is he going to do it? For the sake of the mission? We'll see.

entry.title: Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,242Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng arrived in Gotham, trying to escape her fractured past. She got a job in a café, and things remained simple; until he came along. Damian Wayne. Cold. Arrogant. Rude. And yet, captivating. Damian al Ghul Wayne simply wants an espresso, yet he’s confronted by a fangirl, who is verging on being a stalker, Wait. Why is she phasing through the wall? What's in Goliath's Beard is Happening?

entry.title: Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: IthiaLavella

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,058Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 166

Summary: Damian’s world more than once has turned on its axis. As an assassin, as a vigilante, and as a civilian. His family have done their best to make the most of it. Even if they don’t always understand how his mind functions. Or his concept of courtship.Marinette is like a meteor. A disaster to burn and consume.She’s perfectly imperfect.A rogue attack, brings them together and the disaster consumes more than they bargained for.

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 312,842Chapters: 22/78Kudos: 2,003

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham? Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby). A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?! ___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work. Updating Monthly Maribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: A Failed Betrothal
entry.summary:
Author: Artemis_Chase

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,225Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 1,990

Summary: Damian doesn't want to get married since he is Robin, one of the many Protectors of Gotham City.So does Marinette because she is Ladybug, Leader of the Miraculous Team and has a supervillain on her hands.And the fact that both of them are also sixteen.Unfortunately, the League of Assassins doesn't care about such things and has kidnapped both of them for their wedding (plus Jason and Plagg for some reasons)Fortunately, they escaped before the ceremony even starts and ends up in Paris where Lila is stirring up trouble again.Adrien, after losing his miraculous and his memories of Chat Noir, is fixated on making Marinette his.

entry.title: My Shadow
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,632Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 1,788

Summary: When Marinette was a little girl, she had a friend. He never spoke, never told her his name or anything of the sort, but he was he best friend reguardless. He always followed her everywhere, people would sometimes forget he was even there because of how silent he was. Everyone called him her shadow, matching her move for move, going where she went without a word. It was a fitting name.Shadow disappeared when Marinette turned 8, he only came back 3 years later when she was 11. He came back different, changed in ways she couldn't explain.Now, at 18 years old, Marinette needs his help. Will he answer her call?

entry.title: The after effects of An Akuma.
entry.summary:
Author: Fateofwar

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,630Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 254

Summary: The idea for this work goes to Lilavaporizer9000, some part might be similar.I have little knowing of The DC world as compared to the Heralds and enforcers reading this fanfic. Some characters might be ooc, and if you find any case do tell.And English is not my first language, so any mistake or error is purely due to intervention of the keyboard and my spite for the language if I have any. So, Damian Wayne needs a girlfriend. His family won't stop pestering him with a normal teen life, not after he told them it would be better to spend 24 hours in the asylum rather than in this place where everyone seems to be losing their brain cells.A normal girlfriend would shut them better than anything. Which proved more difficult than solving criminal cases and fighting a Superman with a kryptonite dagger.The second option is find a small group of humans to meet his needs. Which seems impossible considering his general distain for them, as Dick calls it. He is one for sure.Luckily there is a match. Marinette Dupin-Cheng. She’s intelligent, quiet, respectful of his boundaries— generally acceptable.

entry.title: When words collide
entry.summary:
Author: CosmoBugg

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 878Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 11

Summary: Damian Wayne, The son of Bruce Wayne has long hated the way Gotham city operated. Villains and criminals were always attacking on the street. This city held no hope. Not to mention, despite his father being batman, the city never seems to improve. That was until a girl with blue hair began fighting against those villains. And so for the first time in years, Gotham saw light. it saw hope.

entry.title: Breaking His Walls While Building Hers
entry.summary:
Author: Stellar_Arachnida

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,409Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Marinette has been chosen, or more like she was pushed to agree to be selected for the Foreign Exchange program hosted by the Gotham Academy and Collège Françoise Dupont. New adventures await our resident hero of Paris as she takes more responsibility onto her plate. Trying to learn her boundaries and lines that no one should cross, would she be the one to break the highly guarded heart of the one and only Damian Wayne? Additionally, in a dark space with few lights passing through, another shadow lurks... something wicked is brewing?

entry.title: FALLING IN LOVE
entry.summary:
Author: SimpsForVillains

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,264Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 29

Summary: After the Defeat of Hawkmoth , 16 year old Marinette decides to leave Paris due to Lila lies impacting her life and budding career and go to another city to start anew and that city being Gotham , her friends {17 year olds Adrien ,Chloe , Alix , } decides to leave with her to Gotham, though she was still in contact with Luka who was on world tours with Jagged , Kagami who was also with Luka after managing to win custody from her mother , ALix who was taking lessons from her future self while doing Competitions in Skating and her Dad in the Museum and Zoe who was travelling around with Audrey . They start high school in Gotham Academy , where Damian and Jon started schooling , there , Marinette and her friends becomes friends with 17 year olds Damian and Jon , soon romance fills the air .

entry.title: An Orphan Walks into a Cafe Run by a Retired Assassin
entry.summary:
Author: BoatHero1999

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,923Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 16

Summary: Sam Austin(Simpson) is hiding from the League of Assassins in Gotham after her escape. She is just going through the motions, making sure that no one, not even her friends or mother, can find her so that the monsters don't target them. Hence why she picked the dark and dreary Gotham to hide since the Bats don't let the League into their city without a fight. What happens when Cassandra Wayne enters her shop one day and the two hit it off? As Sam falls deeper and harder for Cassandra, the witty, mute, beautiful woman, will her past stay dead? Will she be able to prevent her from seeing the blood on her hands? Or will the ghost of her past not let her rest?

entry.title: The War of Balance
entry.summary:
Author: NightingaleRose2023

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,385Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 310

Summary: The League of Assassins has declared war against the Order of the Guardians, forcing the Miraculous Court, and their beloved leaders, Marinette and Damian, on a mission, a race against time, to recollect the remaining forgotten and missing miraculi around the globe. However, the aftermath of their previous war has created ripples...and with their current fight leading them far too close to a past life, worlds may collide.   After all...   The Al Ghul line will do anything to emerge victorious... (This is book two of my series, so for this story to make sense, please read book one before reading this one.) Now Updates Monthly

entry.title: Steal My Phone, Steal My Heart (Daminette)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,924Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 216

Summary: After 48 sleepless hours in Paris, a disheveled Marinette accidentally grabs the wrong phone—belonging to a rude American tourist. What follows is a chaotic chain of misadventures across the city. But as the day spirals out of control, could this unexpected mix-up be the start of something better?
